body:
Comment 25: 
I think I can recreate your problem now. I started new
https://golang.org/issue/3622, because, I think, it is Go related
(not go-tour).

I also do not like the error message you are getting, so I started
https://golang.org/issue/3623 to track it separately too. Please run
program listed there and post your results in
https://golang.org/issue/3623.

Thank you.

Alex
